entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Thursday 30 March 2023
